metadata.title: CVE-2020-36186 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.8 mishandles the interaction between serialization gadgets and typing, related to org.apache.tomcat.dbcp.dbcp.datasources.PerUserPoolDataSource.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
